full_summary:
====================================

**Liquid Nitrogen Supply and Micro-Bulk Tank Rental Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number: WS3751416511-Doc3752674975**

**Publication Date:** November 16, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** December 19, 2022 at 14:00 EST

**Expected Contract Start Date:** March 29, 2023

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**UNSPSC Codes:**

* 12141903: Nitrogen N
* 24111803: Storage tanks
* 24111808: Fuel storage tanks
* 24131502: Liquid nitrogen refrigerators
* 78131702: Above ground storage or tankage service

**Description:**

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) requires the supply of liquid nitrogen and the rental of a micro-bulk tank (minimum capacity 3,000L) for a period of 5 years for use at the Ottawa Research and Development Centre. The contract is expected to begin on April 1, 2023, and end on March 31, 2028.

**Contact Information:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* Phone: Not available
* Email: [ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ann.lacelle@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Trade Agreements:**

The contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 19, 2022, at 14:00 EST.
